title: Country X - high inflation - effect on currency

content.question: Assume that the inflation rate in Country X is very high relative to the inflation rates in all of its trading partners. Which of the following is likely to happen to Country Xâ€™s currency on the foreign exchange market?

choices.label: The demand curve for the currency will shift to the right, and the currency will appreciate.
The demand curve for the currency will shift to the left, and the currency will depreciate.
The supply curve for the currency will shift to the left, and the currency will appreciate.
The supply curve for the currency will shift to the left, and the currency will depreciate.
There will be no shift in the demand curve for the currency, but the currency will depreciate.

content.answer: The demand curve for the currency will shift to the left, and the currency will depreciate.
